sig_info: While at 7 Cruelty Passives, Ronin gains a Passive Evasion on the next incoming hit for 0.4 to 1.5 seconds. Removes 3 Cruelty Passives when Ronin Evades an attack. Successful Evades do not grant Stance Abilities.
When Ronin Evades an attack, gain a Fury Passive increasing Attack Rating by 11.05 to 16.98 for 12 seconds.
